description.narrative: Continued strategic support to HelpAge Tanzania on accountability in Tanzania programme Overall Goal: Older people live on secure and respectable life. Outcome 1: Older people accessing their basic rights and entitlements to free medical care, social pension and representation in decision making bodies. Outcome 2: Older people Living in safety and freedom from fear
Nationally-coordinated action plan addressing the murder of older people on allegations of witchcraft is in place
Older people, CSOs and HelpAge staff have the capacity to engage and hold the government accountable
Responsive laws, policies and practices on older people's rights including those affected by HIV and AIDS, disaster and emergence
